Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: We collect the domain name and e-mail address (where possible) of visitors to our web page and/or subscribers to our newsletter, aggregate information on what pages consumers access or visit, user-specific information on what pages consumer's access or visit, information volunteered by the consumer, such as survey information and/or site registrations.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
The BusinessWatch Network does not collect any Personally Identifiable Information from you except when you expressly volunteer the information and after you acknowledge your consent through the use of the website. This includes when you:

Register for a seminar, become a Member, purchase or download a BusinessWatch Network product or service.
Request information (electronically) about BusinessWatch Network products and services, subscribe to newsletters, or enter a promotional contest.
Use or participate in various services or features made available on the Website (including, for example and without limitation, blogs and other user communities)
Use various tools to select BusinessWatch Network products and services that are suitable for your website visit.
Request contact with a BusinessWatch Network sales representative.
Provide BusinessWatch Network with comments, questions or feedback about BusinessWatch Network products and services or your website experience.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: “Personally Identifiable Information” includes information that identifies, relates to, or could reasonably be linked with you or your household, and inferences from other personal information that could create a profile about your preferences and characteristics, for example, your name; home or business address; e-mail address; telephone, wireless and/or fax number; short message service or text message address or other wireless device address; instant messaging address; credit card and other payment information; employment information and work experience; demographic information and/or other information that may identify you as an individual or allow online or offline contact with you as an individual.\n\nPersonal Identifiable Information does not include publicly available information that is from federal, state, or local government records, such as professional licenses and public real estate/property records.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: These cookies do not identify, monitor or track any Personally Identifiable Information. BusinessWatch Network uses this information to analyze trends, track visitors' movements and gather broad demographic information for aggregate use. If a visitor rejects the cookie, the visitor may be limited in some areas of the Website.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: The information we collect is made available via the BusinessWatch Network subscriber to reputable organizations for purposes of assisting them in contacting business professionals subscribed to our Network.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: While these cookies remain on your hard drive after the conclusion of your site visit, they do not contain or collect any Personally Identifiable Information and do not read any other information on your computer’s hard drive.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We may share certain aggregate and non-personally identifiable information about our users in order to help deliver more relevant advertisements over their ad networks.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Our information practices may change at some time in the future. Privacy Policy changes will be updated and noted on the Privacy Policy page.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: If you register for a seminar or pay for products and services using a credit card, Personally Identifiable Information (such as your name and shipping address) and financial information (such as your credit card number and expiration date) may be required. This information may be used for billing purposes and to fill orders. If we have trouble processing an order, this contact information may be used to get in touch with you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: The Personally Identifiable Information you give us via the website and information about your order may be combined with other Personally Identifiable Information (such as demographic information and past purchase history) available from our records and other sources (including, without limitation, our worldwide databases). This information may be used to make our future marketing efforts more efficient and will help us to improve the operations and maintenance of our website and business.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Personal Information does not include publicly available information from government records, deidentified or aggregated consumer information, or information excluded from the CCPA’s scope, like:

Health or medical information covered by the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 (HIPAA) and the California Confidentiality of Medical Information Act (CMIA) or clinical trial data;
Personal Information covered by certain sector-specific privacy laws, including the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FRCA), the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA) or California Financial Information Privacy Act (FIPA), and the Driver’s Privacy Protection Act of 1994.
BusinessWatch Network obtains the following categories of Personal Information listed above from the following source:

Directly from you. For example, from forms you complete on our website.
Indirectly from you. For example, from observing your actions on our website.
From third-party business partners such as marketing automation tools, social media sites, and analytics providers.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
We may use or disclose the Personal Information we collect for one or more of the following business purposes:

To fulfill or meet the reason you provided the information. For example, if you share your name and contact information to ask a question about our products or services, we will use that Personal Information to respond to your inquiry. If you provide your Personal Information to purchase a product or service, we will use that information to process your payment and facilitate delivery. We may also save your information to facilitate new product orders or process returns.
To provide, support, personalize, and develop our website, products, and services.
To create, maintain, customize, and secure your account with us.
To process your requests, purchases, transactions, and payments, and prevent transactional fraud.
To provide you with support and to respond to your inquiries, including to investigate and address your concerns and monitor and improve our responses.
To personalize your website experience and to deliver content and product and service offerings relevant to your interests.
To help maintain the safety, security, and integrity of our website, products and services, databases and other technology assets, and business.
For testing, research, analysis, and product development, including to develop and improve our website, products, and services.
To respond to law enforcement requests and as required by applicable law, court order, or governmental regulations.
As described to you when collecting your Personal Information or as otherwise set forth in the CCPA.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: To respond to law enforcement requests and as required by applicable law, court order, or governmental regulations.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
BusinessWatch Network may disclose your Personal Information to a third party for a business purpose. When we disclose Personal Information for a business purpose, we enter a contract that describes the purpose and requires the recipient to both keep that Personal Information confidential and not use it for any purpose except performing the contract. We share your Personal Information with the following categories of third parties:

Service providers, such as payment processors and accounting services
Data aggregators, such as Google Analytics
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
If you are a California resident and wish to be removed from our database pursuant to CCPA regulatory requirements, please go to the link “For California Residents Only – Do Not Sell My Personal Information”, which is located on the first page of our website and can be accessed here. For more information regarding the CCPA Act see https://oag.ca.gov/privacy/ccpa.

There are some exceptions to the opt-out right. Common reasons why we may refuse to stop selling your personal information include:

If a sale is necessary for the business to comply with legal obligations, exercise legal claims or rights, or defend legal claims
If the personal information is certain medical information, consumer credit reporting information, or other types of information exempt from the CCPA
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: If you are a California resident and wish to be removed from our database pursuant to CCPA regulatory requirements, please go to the link “For California Residents Only – Do Not Sell My Personal Information”, which is located on the first page of our website and can be accessed here.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
We may deny your deletion request if retaining the information is necessary for us or our service providers to:
Complete the transaction for which we collected the Personal Information, provide a good or service that you requested, take actions reasonably anticipated within the context of our ongoing business relationship with you, or otherwise perform our contract with you.
Detect security incidents, protect against malicious, deceptive, fraudulent, or illegal activity, or prosecute those responsible for such activities.
Debug products to identify and repair errors that impair existing intended functionality.
Exercise free speech, ensure the right of another consumer to exercise their free speech rights, or exercise another right provided for by law.
Comply with the California Electronic Communications Privacy Act (Cal. Penal Code § 1546 seq.).
Engage in public or peer-reviewed scientific, historical, or statistical research in the public interest that adheres to all other applicable ethics and privacy laws, when the information’s deletion may likely render impossible or seriously impair the research’s achievement, if you previously provided informed consent.
Enable solely internal uses that are reasonably aligned with consumer expectations based on your relationship with us.
Comply with a legal obligation.
Make other internal and lawful uses of that information that are compatible with the context in which you provided it.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: California Residents may request that BusinessWatch Network disclose to you what personal information it has collected, used, shared, or sold about you, and why they collected, used, shared, or sold that information.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: California Residents may request that BusinessWatch Network disclose to you what personal information it has collected, used, shared, or sold about you, and why they collected, used, shared, or sold that information.

Text: To submit such a request, please email support@bizwatchnetwork.com, or call (617) 318-6249.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
BusinessWatch Network will not deny or provide a different level or quality of services just because you exercised your rights under the CCPA. Specifically, we will not:

Deny you goods or services.
Charge you different prices or rates for goods or services, including through granting discounts or other benefits, or imposing penalties.
Provide you a different level or quality of goods or services.
Suggest that you may receive a different price or rate for goods or services or a different level or quality of goods or services.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Your continued use of our website after such notification and/or posting of the updated privacy Notice constitutes your acceptance of such changes.

Personal Information does not include publicly available information from government records, deidentified or aggregated consumer information, or information excluded from the CCPA’s scope, like:

Health or medical information covered by the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 (HIPAA) and the California Confidentiality of Medical Information Act (CMIA) or clinical trial data;
Personal Information covered by certain sector-specific privacy laws, including the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FRCA), the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA) or California Financial Information Privacy Act (FIPA), and the Driver’s Privacy Protection Act of 1994.
BusinessWatch Network obtains the following categories of Personal Information listed above from the following source:

Text:
USE OF PERSONAL INFORMATION:
We may use or disclose the Personal Information we collect for one or more of the following business purposes:

To fulfill or meet the reason you provided the information. For example, if you share your name and contact information to ask a question about our products or services, we will use that Personal Information to respond to your inquiry. If you provide your Personal Information to purchase a product or service, we will use that information to process your payment and facilitate delivery. We may also save your information to facilitate new product orders or process returns.
To provide, support, personalize, and develop our website, products, and services.
To create, maintain, customize, and secure your account with us.
To process your requests, purchases, transactions, and payments, and prevent transactional fraud.
To provide you with support and to respond to your inquiries, including to investigate and address your concerns and monitor and improve our responses.
To personalize your website experience and to deliver content and product and service offerings relevant to your interests.
To help maintain the safety, security, and integrity of our website, products and services, databases and other technology assets, and business.
For testing, research, analysis, and product development, including to develop and improve our website, products, and services.
To respond to law enforcement requests and as required by applicable law, court order, or governmental regulations.
As described to you when collecting your Personal Information or as otherwise set forth in the CCPA.
BusinessWatch Network will not collect additional categories of Personal Information or use the Personal Information we have collected for materially different, unrelated, or incompatible purposes without providing you notice.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Personally Identifiable Information” includes information that identifies, relates to, or could reasonably be linked with you or your household, and inferences from other personal information that could create a profile about your preferences and characteristics, for example, your name; home or business address; e-mail address; telephone, wireless and/or fax number; short message service or text message address or other wireless device address; instant messaging address; credit card and other payment information; employment information and work experience; demographic information and/or other information that may identify you as an individual or allow online or offline contact with you as an individual.\n\nPersonal Identifiable Information does not include publicly available information that is from federal, state, or local government records, such as professional licenses and public real estate/property records.

Text: A cookie is a piece of data that is stored on a visitor’s hard drive. These cookies do not identify, monitor or track any Personally Identifiable Information. BusinessWatch Network uses this information to analyze trends, track visitors' movements and gather broad demographic information for aggregate use.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: The information we collect is made available via the BusinessWatch Network subscriber to reputable organizations for purposes of assisting them in contacting business professionals subscribed to our Network.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: The information we collect is made available via the BusinessWatch Network subscriber to reputable organizations for purposes of assisting them in contacting business professionals subscribed to our Network.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: The information we collect is made available via the BusinessWatch Network subscriber to reputable organizations for purposes of assisting them in contacting business professionals subscribed to our Network.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: In addition, BusinessWatch Network uses various third-party service providers and third party provided services that use cookies which uses sophisticated cookie technology to measure site traffic and visitor behavior in aggregate. While these cookies remain on your hard drive after the conclusion of your site visit, they do not contain or collect any Personally Identifiable Information and do not read any other information on your computer’s hard drive.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: We may share certain aggregate and non-personally identifiable information about our users in order to help deliver more relevant advertisements over their ad networks.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Our information practices may change at some time in the future. Privacy Policy changes will be updated and noted on the Privacy Policy page.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: You have the ability to remove the data from BusinessWatch Network databases at any time by going to the BusinessWatch Network Data Removal Form.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: You have the ability to remove the data from BusinessWatch Network databases at any time by going to the BusinessWatch Network Data Removal Form.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Unless otherwise required by law, we do not provide site visitors or subscribers with access to information that we have collected and maintain about them
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Upon written request visitors may change the following: contact information, financial information, unique identifiers, transaction information, and communications that the visitor/subscriber has directed to the site.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: If you register for a seminar or pay for products and services using a credit card, Personally Identifiable Information (such as your name and shipping address) and financial information (such as your credit card number and expiration date) may be required. This information may be used for billing purposes and to fill orders. If we have trouble processing an order, this contact information may be used to get in touch with you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: This information may be used for billing purposes and to fill orders. If we have trouble processing an order, this contact information may be used to get in touch with you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: This information may be used for billing purposes and to fill orders. If we have trouble processing an order, this contact information may be used to get in touch with you.

Text: The Personally Identifiable Information you give us via the website and information about your order may be combined with other Personally Identifiable Information (such as demographic information and past purchase history) available from our records and other sources (including, without limitation, our worldwide databases). This information may be used to make our future marketing efforts more efficient and will help us to improve the operations and maintenance of our website and business.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Personal Information does not include publicly available information from government records, deidentified or aggregated consumer information, or information excluded from the CCPA’s scope, like:

Health or medical information covered by the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 (HIPAA) and the California Confidentiality of Medical Information Act (CMIA) or clinical trial data;
Personal Information covered by certain sector-specific privacy laws, including the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FRCA), the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA) or California Financial Information Privacy Act (FIPA), and the Driver’s Privacy Protection Act of 1994.
BusinessWatch Network obtains the following categories of Personal Information listed above from the following source:

Directly from you. For example, from forms you complete on our website.
Indirectly from you. For example, from observing your actions on our website.
From third-party business partners such as marketing automation tools, social media sites, and analytics provide
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
USE OF PERSONAL INFORMATION:
We may use or disclose the Personal Information we collect for one or more of the following business purposes:

To fulfill or meet the reason you provided the information. For example, if you share your name and contact information to ask a question about our products or services, we will use that Personal Information to respond to your inquiry. If you provide your Personal Information to purchase a product or service, we will use that information to process your payment and facilitate delivery. We may also save your information to facilitate new product orders or process returns.
To provide, support, personalize, and develop our website, products, and services.
To create, maintain, customize, and secure your account with us.
To process your requests, purchases, transactions, and payments, and prevent transactional fraud.
To provide you with support and to respond to your inquiries, including to investigate and address your concerns and monitor and improve our responses.
To personalize your website experience and to deliver content and product and service offerings relevant to your interests.
To help maintain the safety, security, and integrity of our website, products and services, databases and other technology assets, and business.
For testing, research, analysis, and product development, including to develop and improve our website, products, and services.
To respond to law enforcement requests and as required by applicable law, court order, or governmental regulations.
As described to you when collecting your Personal Information or as otherwise set forth in the CCPA.
BusinessWatch Network will not collect additional categories of Personal Information or use the Personal Information we have collected for materially different, unrelated, or incompatible purposes without providing you notice.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
SHARING YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION:
BusinessWatch Network may disclose your Personal Information to a third party for a business purpose. When we disclose Personal Information for a business purpose, we enter a contract that describes the purpose and requires the recipient to both keep that Personal Information confidential and not use it for any purpose except performing the contract. We share your Personal Information with the following categories of third parties:

Service providers, such as payment processors and accounting services
Data aggregators, such as Google Analytics
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: YOUR RIGHTS FOR DELETION AND OPT OUT PROCESS
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: YOUR RIGHTS FOR DELETION AND OPT OUT PROCESS
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: If you are a California resident and wish to be removed from our database pursuant to CCPA regulatory requirements, please go to the link “For California Residents Only – Do Not Sell My Personal Information”, which is located on the first page of our website and can be accessed here.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: If you are a California resident and wish to be removed from our database pursuant to CCPA regulatory requirements, please go to the link “For California Residents Only – Do Not Sell My Personal Information”, which is located on the first page of our website and can be accessed here.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
There are some exceptions to the opt-out right. Common reasons why we may refuse to stop selling your personal information include:

If a sale is necessary for the business to comply with legal obligations, exercise legal claims or rights, or defend legal claims
If the personal information is certain medical information, consumer credit reporting information, or other types of information exempt from the CCPA
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text:
We may deny your deletion request if retaining the information is necessary for us or our service providers to:
Complete the transaction for which we collected the Personal Information, provide a good or service that you requested, take actions reasonably anticipated within the context of our ongoing business relationship with you, or otherwise perform our contract with you.
Detect security incidents, protect against malicious, deceptive, fraudulent, or illegal activity, or prosecute those responsible for such activities.
Debug products to identify and repair errors that impair existing intended functionality.
Exercise free speech, ensure the right of another consumer to exercise their free speech rights, or exercise another right provided for by law.
Comply with the California Electronic Communications Privacy Act (Cal. Penal Code § 1546 seq.).
Engage in public or peer-reviewed scientific, historical, or statistical research in the public interest that adheres to all other applicable ethics and privacy laws, when the information’s deletion may likely render impossible or seriously impair the research’s achievement, if you previously provided informed consent.
Enable solely internal uses that are reasonably aligned with consumer expectations based on your relationship with us.
Comply with a legal obligation.
Make other internal and lawful uses of that information that are compatible with the context in which you provided it.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: RIGHT TO KNOW:\nCalifornia Residents may request that BusinessWatch Network disclose to you what personal information it has collected, used, shared, or sold about you, and why they collected, used, shared, or sold that information.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: RIGHT TO KNOW:\nCalifornia Residents may request that BusinessWatch Network disclose to you what personal information it has collected, used, shared, or sold about you, and why they collected, used, shared, or sold that information.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI sold / shared

Text: To submit such a request, please email support@bizwatchnetwork.com, or call (617) 318-6249.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
NON-DISCRIMINATION STATEMENT:
BusinessWatch Network will not deny or provide a different level or quality of services just because you exercised your rights under the CCPA. Specifically, we will not:

Deny you goods or services.
Charge you different prices or rates for goods or services, including through granting discounts or other benefits, or imposing penalties.
Provide you a different level or quality of goods or services.
Suggest that you may receive a different price or rate for goods or services or a different level or quality of goods or services.
However, we may offer you certain financial incentives permitted by the CCPA that can result in different prices, rates, or quality levels. Any CCPA-permitted financial incentive we offer will reasonably relate to your Personal Information’s value and contain written terms that describe the program’s material aspects.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY NOTICE:\nBusinessWatch Network reserves the right to make changes to this Privacy Notice at its discretion and at any time. If such changes are material, we will post the updated Privacy Notice on our website along with its effective date.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: EFFECTIVE DATE OF THIS UPDATED POLICY: 02/11/22
